Career Profile

I've been educated, trained and self-taught to be a bioinformatician, healthcare big-data specialist and various pipeline maker of biological data analysis. In the forseable futher I will focus in the fields of genetic testing, healthcare big-data and privacy protection of personal molecular information.

Experiences

Senior Bioinformatician & Big-data manager

2015.01 - Present
CloudHealth Genomics, Shanghai

During the very beginning time, colleagues and I constructed WGS (Whole Genome Sequencing) data analysis pipeline based on BWA and GATK for X10; I participated in developing CloudHealth’s first genetic testing product GenoMe TM ; project leader of CloudHealth’s Chinese Population Genomics; I designed and developed CHAPM, which provides an ideal platform for customer experiences; I also developed a database called CHVAR and API services for CloudHealth Life Big-data.

Bioinformatics R&D Engineer

2014.7 - 2014.12
Shaghai Biotecan Pharmaceuticals, Shanghai

During this time, I constructed a series of clinical diagnoses scheme based on Affymetrix platform, which supports detection of CNV diseases including autism, myelodysplastic syndrome, multiple myeloma and multiple miscarriage; meanwhile, I participated in the design and construction of clinical diseases related gene mutation database, which is an import part of company's "Big medical data" orientation.

Bioinformatics Engineer

2013.7 - 2014.6
Shanghai Biotechnology Corporation, Shanghai

When I was at Shanghai Biotechnology Co. Ltd., performing RNA-Seq data analysis is the main work, meanwhile starting from scratch, I generated bioinformatics analysis pipeline of 16s rDNA sequencing all by myself, which enabled this field's business; I also made an online tool for miRNA targets prediction tool.

Projects

GenoMeTM - 2015-01-2015-12, I participated in developing CloudHealth’s first genetic testing product GenoMe TM , in this project, I was responsible for the variation annotation standard and calculation of populational variations.
CHAPM - 2015-01 ~ now, I constructed CHAPM, providing samples tracking, sequencing experiments monitoring, data QC and online healthcare reports.
CloudHealth Genetic Testing System - 2015-01 ~ now, I constructed first version of CloudHealth genetic testing order management system with features such as order tracking, message notification and online report.
CloudHealth Big-data - 2015-01 ~ now, I initiated the database structure and data collecting system for CloudHealth Big-data.
16s rDNA Pipeline - 2013-11 ~ 2014-06, I built the bioinformatics data analysis pipeline for 16s rDNA projects, and assisted colleges from experimental department with equipment and reagent optimization.
miRNA Targets Query System - 2013-09 ~ 2013-11, I developed an online tool for miRNA targets prediction, which includes 5 common databases and supports data query and download.
IOD - 2011-09 ~ 2011-11, I constructed an GUI-based integrative algorithm software for microarray data analysis, whose name is Integrative Outlier Detection software, IOD.
